3免费文库.requestInfo:
@js:
return 'https://m.jjwxc.net/free/tagtop/' + params.pageIndex + '?tagid=' + params.filters.tags + '&novelsize=' + params.filters.size + '&novelendtime=' + params.filters.time + '&xx=' + params.filters.sex + '&order=' + params.filters.order;

4高级搜索.author: //td[1]/a
4高级搜索.requestInfo:
@js:
return 'http://www.jjwxc.net/bookbase.php?fw' + params.filters.range + '&fbsj' + params.filters.time + '&ycx' + params.filters.origin + '&xx' + params.filters.sex + '&mainview' + params.filters.mainview + '&sd' + params.filters.setting + '&lx' + params.filters.cat + '&fg' + params.filters.style + '&bq=' + params.filters.tags + '&page=' + params.pageIndex + '&isfinish=' + params.filters.status + '&sortType=' + params.filters.sort;
